summary: My main goal is to ensure that procedures are followed for seating and serving guests. I aim to ensure staff act in a way that promotes guest satisfaction and handle any issues or complaints. I will design and implement training for servers, bussers, hosts, baristas, and bartenders. This training will involve training on menu items, as well as shadowing other servers to learn the restaurant's procedures and standards. I will work side by side with the kitchen management and team to assist with cost controls by helping develop systems to manage product waste, labor costs, and breakage. I will oversee facility upkeep, ensuring that the front of house areas are clean and meet restaurant standards while arranging that repairs are made in a timely manner and I will perform facilities maintenance as needed.

experience.title: Pastry Chef / Server
experience.description: Effectively managed and assisted kitchen staff in producing food for banquets, catered events and member dining areas. Consistently produced exceptional menu items that regularly garnered diners' praise.

experience.title: Line Cook
experience.description: Regularly developed new recipes in accordance with consumer tastes, nutritional needs, and budgetary considerations. Provided nutritious, safe, visually appealing, innovative and properly prepared and flavored food.

experience.title: Dishwasher
experience.description: Consistently kept a clean and safe environment by adhering to all federal, state and local sanitation and safety requirements. Maintained system of control for storage temperatures and proper functioning of kitchen equipment.

experience.title: Customer Service Rep
experience.description: Developed highly empathetic client relationships and earned reputation for exceeding sales goals. Achieved high sales percentage with consultative, value-focused customer service approach.

experience.title: Catering Assistant/Server
experience.description: Accepted payment from customers and made change as necessary. Checked patrons' identification to ensure that they met minimum age requirements for consumption of alcoholic beverages. Cleaned bars, work areas, and tables. Assisted diners with seating as needed.

experience.title: Customer Service Representative
experience.description: Assigned as point person to plan event logistics for trade show resulting in over $250,000 in revenue. Effectively cross trained in processing freight, vendor relations, administrative support, event set up/break down and logistics planning.

experience.title: Shift Manager
experience.description: Promoted within 1 month to shift manager supervising 20+ employees. Managed daily restaurant operations, created staff schedules, tracked/reviewed inventory, cross trained staff, closed out cash drawer, ran sales reports.

education.degree: Associate of Science Degree: Social Science Studies Administrative Justice Studies

certifications: National Restaurant Association ServSafe Manager Certification
